text: Kairos is a solution company for solving
supply-demand mismatches in healthcare
this notion that we as patients are told
to wait weeks for a doctor's appointment
and we assume that that's because every
doctor's booked out solid but when you
actually start to look at the data it
turns out most provider organizations
are actually operating at far below
their available capacity our system is
designed to do two things one is surface
that availability so we look at
thousands of data sources billions of
data points about providers demographics
clinical information availability
location insurance etc and then we
provide applications that then allow
patients to submit their criteria what
is their clinical need what are their
insurance what when do they want to come
in and match them in real-time
dynamically to the best possible
provider within that network we actually
studied what were the factors that
influence the way that physicians were
making those referral decisions in the
absence of a data platform and it turned
out that the vast majority of physicians
were basing their knowledge just purely
anecdotally who did I train with who was
down the hall from me in my practice you
know who did my buddies recommend to me
we've invested in tons of thought
leadership marketing to educate the
market around this problem of the
supply-demand mismatch and ultimately it
tied back to revenue which was what got
the attention of CFOs who ultimately
became our buyers around this solution
saying okay sure you're spending tens of
billions of dollars hundreds of billions
of dollars implementing these platforms
that will allow you to capture data
about those patients and book
appointments about those patients but
how are you actually acquiring new
business and how are you making sure
that you're retaining that business once
you have those customers consumers are
being given choice the reality of
healthcare is that it is multi-channel
it's not just that everything is going
to be done online or digitized or
through chat box but the human aspect of
healthcare will always be there no
matter what and that's really the
philosophy behind our platform is we
take what we call a multi-channel
approach to patient access we provide
solutions for the online patient
experience the phone based experience
65% of appointments are still booked via
the phone and then
the remainder of the interactions happen
in persons our platform covers all those
bases and the benefit from a consumer
perspective is that you now will get a
consistent experience no matter where
you're coming in from
